availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wesley Adams (Louisville, Kentucky, tavern keeper and liquor inspector)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavern keeper and liquor inspector. Indiana native. Married to Mary Jane Brown Adams in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 7, 1845. Father of Charles K. Adams, John M. Adams, Samuel N. Adams, Robert N. Adams, Elizabeth Adams, and Frank Adams. Grocer in Louisville in 1850. Tavern keeper in Louisville from 1855 to 1861. Liquor inspector in Louisville from 1861 through 1865.
